import { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Button, Header, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import baseUrl from '../../utils/baseUrl' const ProductAttributes = ({ _id, description }) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) const router = useRouter() const handleDelete = async () => { const url = `${baseUrl}/api/product` const payload = { params: { _id } } await axios.delete(url, payload) router.push('/') } return ( <>
